professional_summary: Data Engineer pursuing M.S. in Analytics with a focus on Data Science and Marketing at the University of Texas at Dallas. Experienced in deriving business insights from data using analytics and data-driven methods, expected to graduate in December 2019.

key_responsibilities: and dashboards using Tableau/PowerBI to track company performance and KPI metrics.
Implemented a Business Name Swap model using Naive Bayes Algorithm to resolve issues with misclassification of business names.
Modeled probability of attrition using Logistic Regression and Random Forest with an accuracy of 80%.
Applied statistical concepts to analyze business cases published by Harvard Business School.
Used Linear Regression and RStudio to predict factors affecting the difference in pricing for premium economic tickets.
Designed data flow diagrams and schema mapping on Oracle database.
Implemented Linear Regression using Gradient Descent and Machine Learning classification algorithms (SVM
Boosting) on UCI Facebook Comment Dataset.
Developed solutions for service information management.
